text: ~37% of 🇺🇸 population has now received a first dose of #COVID19 #vaccine. If we can maintain or ⬆️ our current pace of #vaccination, we could reach herd immunity in ~June. To get there, we will have to persuade some vaccine-hesitant folks, be vaccinating 12+ age group, or both. https://t.co/a48bTulxFk
